pageProduct.name: Pevaryl Foaming Solution 1% 3x10g Sachets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Pevaryl Anti-Fungal Foaming Solution is for the treatment of Fungal skin infections such as Pityriasis Versicolor of the whole body, athlete's foot, tinea and ringworm as well as other candidal complaints.

Pevaryl Anti-Fungal Foaming Solution is for the treatment of fungal skin infections such as Pityriasis Versicolor, a fungal skin infection causing scaly or flaky discolouration of the skin. Pevaryl Anti-Fungal Foaming Solution is also effective at treating athlete's foot, tinea and ringworm as well as other candidal complaints.

Size: 10g

KEY FEATURES

• Pevaryl Foaming Solution contains econazole 1% w/w
• Pevaryl Foaming Solution only requires a short 3 day treatment
• Odourless

Warnings

This product contains benzyl alcohol, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone as preservatives.

CAUTION

Pharmacy Medicine.
Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Econazole 1% w/w

Directions

Apply as directed.

How to Use the Sachets
1. In the evening, shower and wash your hair in the normal way.
2. When finished, turn off the shower and apply Pevaryl Foaming Solution to the skin and scalp. Rub in well for 3-5 minutes.
3. You may dry your hair, but DO NOT rinse the solution off your body or out of your hair.
4. Next morning, take a shower if desired.
5. Repeat the process for the next 2 evenings.
6. Repeat the course 1 month and 3 months after the initial treatment to prevent relapse.
7. If no relief is obtained after 1 week, consult your doctor or pharmacist.

USAGE ADVICE

For external use only.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.
